author: serge
msg: Updated a list of some matchers that need to be written, and some other items.

author: serge
msg: Subject matchers from Dino (and remove extra variables in SenderIs)

author: serge
msg: Fixes to build and startup scripts to use new Xerces jar.

author: serge
msg: Moved to Collection API, changed Matcher to public Collection match(Mail mail), added AbstractRecipientMatcher which defines match method and leaves abstract public boolean matchRecipient(String recipient) for simple matching.

author: serge
msg: Added remote addr and remote host to Mail object, storing from socket in SMTPHandler.  Generates socket specific "ID" and builds Received header as per specs.  Also adds Date and From headers if not added (current time and MAIL FROM, respectively)
